mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from studyboard WHERE num = #{num} and boardid=#{boardid}
mapper.insert: insert into boardtype(studynum, boardid, boardname, chkprivate) values(#{studynum},#{boardid},#{boardname},#{chkprivate})
insert into studyboard(num, writer, subject, reg_date, content,readcount, boardid, filename, filesize) values(#{num},#{writer},#{subject}, sysdate, #{content},0,#{boardid},#{filename},#{filesize})
mapper.update: update studyboard set readcount = readcount +1 where num=#{num} and boardid =#{boardid}
mapper.select: select * from studyboard where num =#{num} and boardid =#{boardid}
select * from boardtype where studynum =#{group} and boardid =#{boardid}
mapper.update: update studyboard set writer=#{writer}, email=#{email},subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where num=#{num}
mapper.delete: delete from studyboard where num=#{num} and passwd=#{passwd}
mapper.select: select * from boardtype where studynum = #{group} order by chkprivate desc
